segments.text: Did you move into your new apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but I ’ m afraid it ’ s still a mess . I haven ’ t put anything away yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . It ’ ll probably take you about three weeks to get everything organized .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t say that . It looks like a dump now . I can ’ t stand it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you taken a walk around your neighborhood yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean by that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took a long walk through the neighborhood this morning on my way to the train station . It took me 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but you only pay 800 dollars a month . Emm , it ’ s hard to decide which is better , shorter commuting time or lower rent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought paying a lower rent would be better , but now I ’ m not sure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , if you consider 7-11 is a supermarket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds like you better buy a bicycle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right , or I ’ m going to spend a lot of time walking .
segments.speaker: S2
